title: Chronic kidney disease progression in diabetic patients: Real world data in general practice
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Michelangelo Rottura, Selene Francesca Anna Drago, Viviana Maria Gianguzzo, Antonino Molonia, Giovanni Pallio, Riccardo Scoglio, Sebastiano Marino, Angela Alibrandi, Egidio Imbalzano, Francesco Squadrito, Natasha Irrera, Vincenzo Arcoraci, Audit & Research Messina Primary Care Group
